sourcesContent:
Customer Form

salutation is required
Gender is required

You submitted the following:

Name
{{ customer.salutation }}
Alter Ego
{{ customer.firstname }}
Power
{{ customer.gender }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup, FormControl } from '@angular/forms'; import { Customer } from './customer'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-customer', templateUrl: './add-customer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-customer.component.css'] }) export class AddCustomerComponent { customer: Customer = {} as Customer; isSubmitted = false; Genders = ["Male", "Female", "Other"]; public clear() { this.customer = {} as Customer; } public onSubmit() { this.isSubmitted = true; } }
